item.title: [148] Is Kid Pauline REALLY Pauline?
item.description:
>Donkey Kong Bananza is a prequel to Mario Odyssey
>Lady is Pauline's grandma
>Kid Pauline grow up to be the Mayor of New Donk City and even renaming it in honor of Donkey Kong.

I did my research on this to see if that is true. And it turns out, all of that is wrong.

After taking all the clues and references from both games, everyone is missing the HUGE sign where Bananza and Odyssey stand in the timeline, if there is one. And who really is Kid Pauline's grandma.

I notice something different between Odyssey's New Donk City and Bananza's NDC. They both are from a different timeline, but not in that order people think it is.

Odyssey's DNC actually take place in 1950's while Bananza's is present day. Look at the NDC in SMO, even the residents are wearing 50's clothing. While NDC's residents in Bananza are wearing modern day clothing.

Also, Mayor Pauline named the city after Donkey Kong. But Bananza's city is ALREADY named New Donk City. So how can she name a city the same name where she grew up in? And how can Bananza be a prequel to Odyssey when NDC already existed?

And the answer to that is: SM Odyssey really take place BEFORE DK Bananza. Bananza is actually a sequel to Odyssey!

So if that's true, how did Pauline became a 13yo girl in the present day NDC? And the answer is: They're NOT the same character.

Remember when Kid Pauline was talking about her grandma and how she was a singer back in her days? Well, that's Pauline!

Kid Pauline's grandma is really Pauline!

And no, Lady is NOT Kid Pauline's grandma because of the Lady dress. Lady and older Pauline are the same character. The creators of the arcade DK changed Lady's name to Pauline WAY before her current redesign in DK'94 for marketing. The Lady dress was just a reference to older Pauline's Lady design.

And one more thing. It's VERY common to name your child after your parents. How I know? I'm named after my Grandfather.

Original filename: paulines.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 84] Roy Thomas
item.description:
How come nobody ever talks about what a piece of shit this guy is?

>Vision is a swiped from Jack Kirby

>Man-Thing is a swipe of Swamp-Thing

>Steals Wolverine from a fan contest in the fanzine, FOOM, in which tge real creator Andy Olsen not only gives him metal bones but the name as well.

>Steals the idea for the Defenders from a 10-year-old fan who sent in a letter in 1966.

>Swipes Big Barda from Jack Kirby and calls her Thundra.

>Also tells Jim Starlin to swipe Darkseid from Jack Kirby resulting in the creation of Thanos.

>Spends much of his career fucking with Jack Kirby and playing dumb about it, publicly defending Stan Lee

>Repeatedly shits on Jack Kirby's writing to make Stan feel better.

>Clara Noto, Marvel writer who penned numerous Red Sonja stories: "Roy never paid me my share of the reprint rights on Red Sonja. He is a tricky little fellow and very mean when cornered."

item.title: [124] Absolutely Battarded
item.description:
This has to be the most retarded comic in recent memory. There are plenty of genuinely stupid and cringy books written by morons, yes, but Absolute Batman is on a wholly different level because it thinks it's actually smart and biting commentary. Meanwhile the faggot writing it doesn't know what stomach acid is, and has the "working class" Batman have a "Batmobile" that is literally an extremely specific mining vessel. The big change is that he's now a literal giant, and Bane is the reincarnation of the Nephilim size-wise.
>bro, Batman is a hero bro and the rich are evil bro so Batman is now a 6'9" "working class" supergenius that works as a construction worker to make ends meet bro, it's so much more realistic bro
>yeah bro, those evil rich white supremacists bro, they're the real problem bro
>Absolute Batman is friends with his small town diverse group of friends from the hood bro, this Batman is all about burning local and keeping it real bro, unlike his pampered prime counterpart bro
>anyway he somehow carries a big axehead on his chest and then that turns into a BATtle axe bro, it's so cool bro, he chops off hands bro
>and he's still not killing anyone bro, because that's like, important bro
I can't wait to see how legitimately retarded billionaire Jokah Baybee will be.

Original filename: screenshot-2025-06-11-121256-1749661280580.png

item.title: [ 73] 2008 recession: How did it looks like at first?
item.description:
To anons that went through 2008 recession, according to your observation during that times, how did the recession manifest at first?
How did people know that they have just entered recession?
What are the earliest signs that you can observe as normal folks?
Is it news telling them that recession has begun?
Is it when they saw their money has been inflated to hell and can't afford groceries?
What are the early signs?

Tbh, we can already see the signs happening right now, because the next recession will begin around 2027. But I'm trying to get as many testimonies as I can so the picture will be clearer, so we can brace ourselves for the next recession and save our assets.

Original filename: 1753395402127538.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

Hackers leak user data from thousands on Tea app, a safe space for women to chat about men

Administrators of the Tea App, which is designed to help women “date safely” and reportedly boasts over four million users as of this week, confirmed the breach Friday.

The cyber attack occurred at around 6.45 a.m. PT, when the app’s legacy storage system was compromised and hackers gained access to all user data prior to February 2024.

item.title: [ 45] Trump says he's allowed to pardon Ghislaine Maxwell
item.description:
https://www.forbes.com/sites/alisondurkee/2025/07/25/trump-says-hes-allowed-to-pardon-ghislaine-maxwell-amid-epstein-files-controversy/
President Donald Trump did not rule out the possibility of pardoning Jeffrey Epstein associate Ghislaine Maxwell on Friday—saying he hadn’t “thought about” the possibility but is “allowed” to pardon her—as Maxwell’s interview with Justice Department prosecutors this week has sparked new questions about whether the Trump administration could offer her a pardon in exchange for exonerating the president from Epstein’s crimes.

Trump was asked about the possibility of pardoning Maxwell as she enters her second day of questioning by the DOJ and Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche.

Maxwell is serving a 20-year prison sentence after being convicted on charges of sex trafficking and transporting minors to participate in illegal sex acts, stemming from her role in Epstein’s alleged sexual abuse.

Trump told reporters he “hadn’t thought about” pardoning Maxwell or commuting her sentence, adding, “I’m allowed to do it, but it’s something I have not thought about.”

The president did not respond to a follow up question asking if that meant he had not ruled out the possibility of pardoning Maxwell.

The DOJ’s interview with Maxwell has sparked criticism that it could tee up a potential pardon, as legal experts speculate the Epstein associate has little reason to speak with prosecutors unless it could benefit her case.

Legal analysts have suggested the Trump administration could pardon Maxwell in exchange for testimony that’s favorable to Trump, with former Watergate prosecutor Nick Akerman telling CNN prosecutors are hoping Maxwell “will be motivated to say that Donald Trump didn't know what Jeffrey Epstein was up to with underage girls and they never participated in that.”

Original filename: 1743936281316531.jpg

>Emacs is an extensible, customizable, self-documenting free/libre text editor and computing environment, with a Lisp interpreter at its core.

item.title: [ 32] >plan a camping trip with 4 friends where we're going to hit some trails >i dr
item.description:
>plan a camping trip with 4 friends where we're going to hit some trails
>i drive us 8 hours to the campground we're gonna stay at
>they're all saying how excited they are to do all of these trails
>get there - eat food
>they sleep
>think "ahh probably just exhausted from that car ride"
>go out on my own do a trail, have some beers and sleep
>next day
>make breakfast
>1 hour after breakfast they sleep
>well i'm not going to sit around and sleep
>go do a few trails on my own
>come back - they're still sleeping
>i get hungry so i make some food
>they wake up and sit on their phones
>"so what are we eating"
>end up making tacos for everyone, don't mind because i like cooking on the fire
>we eat and i say "do you guys wanna go to x trail nearby that leads to the beach for the sunset?"
>takes them forever to get ready, miss sunset
>they complain about mosquitos biting them the whole time
>"YEAH GREAT IDEA ANON WTF"
>get back to the site seething, tired but have some beers by the fire and try to hang out
>12am rolls around
>anon you're sleeping already wtf?

repeat this for the next 2 days. on the bright side, i got out and got to see some stuff and take some nice pictures

I would like to hear stories of your disappointing /out/ trips and/or failed group trips.

Original filename: pepecamp.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 44] Italian Travel
item.description:
Spending a week a friend's house in Venetto Italy. Went to Venice, Bologna, Rovigo, Verona, Revana, Forli.
Pros:
- Not insanely hot
- Amazing Food
- Beer is not as bad as I thought it woul be.
- Everyone looks good, the wops are actually white.
- Surprisingly affordable if you aren't dumb.
- People are ridiculously friendly, not used to this since I grew up with southerners and they're absolute scum.
- Verona is the most beautiful city I've ever seen.
- Trains are decent.

Cons:
- Niggers
- Jeets
- Abduls
- High Taxes if one were to live here.

Is it worth going to Florence tomorrow? Is it worth moving to Verona? For context, I am white with blue eyes.

Original filename: z4MpSyGSXd8fYvYFqaoYhlemjscQG9ss3uNN29AS.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [157] what strange / spooky stuff have you seen? once when i was in the desert, th
item.description:
what strange / spooky stuff have you seen?

once when i was in the desert, there was a telephone pole, on it looked exactly like a 10ft tall bird of prey, just eyeing me down
it was about a good 5min of walking, which felt like forever, just to see that it was a transformer that looked weird, none of the other poles had it either
sounds dumb, but it really did look exactly like a gigantic human sized hawk, and the "head" even seemed to follow you too, really interesting illusion, since it also hit all the primal parts of the brain that gone "you're about to be fucking eaten by a bird!!!!!!"
a year or two later, when i was gonna take a picture, it was gone, which adds a strange air to "it was right there, i tell you!"

>inb4 go to /x/ for this shit
i want real stories, not >i smelled the rotten shit fart gas, and my best friend was turned into a skinwalker, and then i pulled out that gun from videogame and blasted it, dude trust me

Original filename: pngtree-the-light-shining-through-a-tunnel-of-tree.gif
item.author: Anonymous
